text: People Before Profit (PBP) is a minor political party in the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland. They are neutral on whether Northern Ireland should join the Republic of Ireland or stay in the United Kingdom and are on the left wing, supporting socialism. They have 4 out of 160 seats in the Dáil Éireann and 1 of 90 seats in the Northern Ireland Assembly. == References == Category:Political parties in Northern Ireland Category:Political parties in the Republic of Ireland
title: People Before Profit
